name: Stay Alive (Fa1cao)
description:
Welcome to Stay Alive

To control our hero, you need to follow the controls below:

Key arrows:

Going into pipes or doors - Top;

to squat, go into pipes -Down;

Right - walk right;

Left - walk left;

Z , X  and Space Bar keys:

Z - interact with NPC's ,  grab items , and shoot (when you have a gun);

X - Jump  and continue dialogue during a conversation;

Space Bar - Drop weapons ;

If you want to access the main menu you must press enter and then press Shift to choose whatever option you want.

We warn you to be careful with your volume, our advice is to in the beggining  to turn down your volume,  the original engine have a very loud music and doesn't let the player turn it off.

And don't forget, Stay Alive!

Your opinion is very important for us, so when you finish playing our game please aswer our form so we can improve and maybe use your suggestions for this game.

We thank you in advandce!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdUqXikvH1w33ozyDIuJ5PckKbZvjkNSnfwtYM_71GZhKsExQ/viewform?usp=sf_link
